description: This is the main HTML file for a database visualization web interface, including embedded CSS styles and JavaScript code for dynamic behavior, such as fetching database list, tables, and data, and rendering tables with expandable cells.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list and resets the UI.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands/collapses a database to show/hide tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Loads and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Fetches and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders the data table with expandable cells.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Renders individual cell content, handling objects and long text.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for wide or complex data.
